answers.answer: Not sure, I have been on the pump for 2 yrs and never had that feeling other then my back itches all the time. Might want to call the Pump factory or your Endocronologist that help train you on the pump and see if this is a side affect???
if your site is in your arm, it might be your tubing touching your back.  That's the best I can think of...

question: I am 9 years old and have diabetes with new pump on I can feel a spider sometimes crawlng over my back, what may be the cause?
title: caitlin
